meanings.definition: The area beside a court where spectators sit to watch a game.
meanings.sent1: Fans eagerly filled the courtsides to cheer for their favorite team.
meanings.sent2: The basketball players high-fived the fans sitting at the courtsides.
meanings.sent3: The courtsides were so packed that some fans had to share seats!
meanings.sent4: The energy on the courtsides was electric, sparking excitement in the air.
meanings.sent5: The courtsides offered a prime view of the game, making every moment unforgettable.

meanings.definition: The seats located closest to the playing area in a sports arena.
meanings.sent1: Celebrities often occupy the courtsides during major sporting events.
meanings.sent2: The courtsides provide a premium view of the action on the field.
meanings.sent3: The courtsides felt like VIP seats, with plush cushions and great views.
meanings.sent4: Sitting at the courtsides made me feel like part of the game itself.
meanings.sent5: The courtsides were like front-row tickets to all the sports excitement.
